greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficient table for sums of squares of Chebyshev's S-Polynomials.
comment: See A049310 for the coefficient table of Chebyshev's S(n,x)=U(n,x/2) polynomials.
The triangle for the coefficients of x^2 in S(n,x)^2 is A158454. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 18 2012
xref: Row sums (signed) look like: A004523. Row sums (unsigned): A128496.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_ Apr 04 2007
